Uses of Class
ch.unibas.informatik.hs15.cs203.datarepository.api.Criteria

    • Uses of Criteria in ch.unibas.informatik.hs15.cs203.datarepository.api

      Methods in ch.unibas.informatik.hs15.cs203.datarepository.api that return Criteria 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Criteria Criteria.all()
      Returns a criteria which are matched by all data sets.
      static Criteria Criteria.forId(String id)
      Returns a criteria which can only be matched by the data set with specified id.
      Methods in ch.unibas.informatik.hs15.cs203.datarepository.api with parameters of type Criteria 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<MetaData> DataRepository.delete(Criteria deletionCriteria)
      Deletes the data sets fulfilling the specified criteria.
      List<MetaData> DataRepository.export(Criteria exportCriteria, File target, ProgressListener progressListener)
      Exports the data sets fulfilling the specified criteria to the specified target folder.
      List<MetaData> DataRepository.getMetaData(Criteria searchCriteria)
      Returns a list of meta data of all data sets fulfilling the criteria.
